scripts.zip: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ../lambda-zip/lambda-sqs-delta-to-db.zip && npm install --only='prod' && zip -r ../lambda-zip/lambda-sqs-delta-to-db.zip node_modules src/*
scripts.zip-prod: mkdir -p out && rm -rf out/lambda-sqs-delta-to-db.zip && zip -r -q out/lambda-sqs-delta-to-db.zip node_modules src/*
